content.question: The function <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is a transformation of a logarithmic function with base <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math>. The domain of <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is all real numbers less than <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math>. In the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane, the graph of <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> has a <math alttext="y"><mi>y</mi></math>-intercept of <math alttext="open parentheses 0 comma 1 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and a vertical asymptote at <math alttext="x equals 2"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>. Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="k open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="log subscript 2 open parentheses x minus 2 close parentheses"><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="log subscript 2 open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses"><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="log subscript 2 open parentheses 2 minus x close parentheses"><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="log subscript 2 open parentheses 2 minus x close parentheses plus 1"><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="log subscript 2 open parentheses 2 minus x close parentheses"><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
